parameters.name: cdn
parameters.description: Target CDN id. If you're using any other CDN than default one, ask your account manager for CDN id.

get.description: Gets a complete changelog of an application.
Gets the basic information for all published versions. When API Key is provided, draft version information is included if draft version exists.

post.description: Creates a new version if there's no draft version yet.

403.description: API key invalid or draft version already exists.

get.summary: Gets app latest app version id
get.description: Gets latest application version id. Please use /apps/{app_secret} instead to get the latest version.
Gets selected version object. If API key is provided, can get the information about draft version.

patch.description: Updates selected version properties. You can update any number of properties, because you're not required to pass all of them. Omited properties will remain unchanged.

parameters.name: publish_when_processed
parameters.description: Change if version should be published when processing is done.

get.summary: Gets app version content torrent url
get.description: Gets selected application version content torrent url.

parameters.name: key_secret
parameters.description: Key secret provided by key server. This value is optional and is needed only if application is secured by license keys.

get.summary: Gets app version diff torrent url
get.description: Gets selected application version diff torrent url.

parameters.name: key_secret
parameters.description: Key secret provided by key server. This value is optional and is needed only if application is secured by license keys.

get.description: Gets selected application version content urls.
Gets selected application version diff urls.

put.description: Updates the draft version with given content file. Version needs to be processed afterwards, so a job guid is returned. Should file or upload_id be passed.

403.description: Invalid secret or version is not a draft version.

post.description: Allows to use another application content as this version's content without the need of uploading it again.

parameters.name: source_app_secret
parameters.description: App Secret that you'd like to merge

parameters.name: source_vid
parameters.description: Source version ID that you'd like to merge

parameters.name: copy_label
parameters.description: If set to true, it will copy the value of source version label

parameters.name: copy_changelog
parameters.description: If set to true, it will copy the value of source version changelog

put.description: Updates the draft version with given diff file. Version needs to be processed afterwards, so a job guid is returned. Should file or upload_id be passed.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Zip file with application binary diffs.

parameters.name: diff_summary
parameters.description: Required when diff_file is set. Using diff summary format.

403.description: Invalid secret or version is not a draft version.

post.description: Publishes selected version. Given version should be a draft version.

404.description: One or more keys not found

post.description: Marks multiple keys as not distributed.

404.description: One or more keys not found
One or more keys not found
One or more keys not found

post.description: Marks all keys from collection invividually as ditributed. Keys already marked as distributed wouldn't be changed.
Marks all keys from collection invividually as ditributed. Keys already marked as distributed wouldn't be changed.
Blocks all keys from collection invidually.
Unblocks all keys from collection individually.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Application owner API key. Required when not using a session.

parameters.name: upload_token
parameters.description: Version upload token. It can be used instead of api_key or sessions.

401.description: Not authenticated. If using upload_token, it can be invalid or expired.

parameters.name: md5
parameters.description: Optional MD5 sum of given chunk. If given, server will perform chunk validation before accepting it. In case of invalid MD5 sum, a precognition failed (412) http code is returned.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Application owner API key. Required when not using a session.

parameters.name: upload_token
parameters.description: Version upload token. It can be used instead of api_key or sessions.

412.description: Validation of chunk has failed. Try sending it again.

post.description: Need to be an adminsitrator to do that.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Application owner API key. Required when not using a session.

post.description: This call can be only executed in the web browser.
This call can be only executed in the web browser.

get.description: Gets the list of default system patchers. If there's no default patcher set for specified platform, secret will be null.

post.description: Reports a statistic event for data analytics. Events are often divided to starting and finishing events.

app_secret.description: Secret of game application if applicable.

app_version.description: Version of game application if applicable.

sender_id.description: Unique client id. Should remain the same for all applications launched on this machine + account. Used to identify the player.

caller.description: Caller id the same as for caller GET parameters. More information: http://redmine.patchkit.net/projects/patchkit-documentation/wiki/Web_API_General_Info

operating_system_version.description: Operating system version without family name, for instance '10.11' for OSX.

job_guid.description: Job GUID to be used with Jobs API.

use_keys.description: If set to true, application needs to contact keys server to get valid key_secret for content download.

current_version.description: Current number of publicly available version (does not count drafts). If 0, no version has been yet published.

lowest_version_with_diff.description: The number of lowest version that has a diff file available. For instance if player has version 3 and lowest_version_with_diff=4 then the player can upgrade from version 3 to 4 using diff file. But when lowest_version_with_diff=5 then it's not possible to apply a diff file and player has to re-download the game instead.

patcher_banner_image.description: An https url to image banner that should be displayed inside the patcher. Watch out for patcher_banner_image_dimensions, but for now the size will be fixed at 600x230. If this field is set to null, a default (stored) image should be used. The image will be always in PNG format.

patcher_banner_image_updated_at.description: Date and time when patcher banner image has been updated.

patcher_download_speed_unit.description: Tells the patcher what format should be used to display download speed unit. human_readable should display kilobytes unless download speed exceeds 1024 kilobytes/s, then megabytes should be displayed.

patcher_whitelabel.description: If set to true, no PatchKit logo or PatchKit reference should be visible on the patcher.

patcher_secret.description: The secret of patcher to use.

content_meta_guid.description: Guid of content meta file if available.

diff_guid.description: Guid of diff file or null if there's no diff.

diff_meta_guid.description: Guid of diff meta file if available.

draft.description: Set to true if this version is a draft version.

publish_progress.description: If pending_publish is true, this number will indicate the publishing progress.

main_executable.description: Main executable relative path without slash at the beginning.

ignored_files.description: Relative list of paths that should be ignored for local data consistency.

publish_when_processed.description: Set to true if version will be published after successfull processing.

can_be_imported.description: If true then this version can be imported to other application. Visible only for owners.

version.description: Version string. Format: MAJOR.MINOR. Present in >= 2.4

size.description: Uncompressed file size in bytes. Present in >= 2.3

version.description: Version string. Format: MAJOR.MINOR. Present in >= 2.4

meta_url.description: Url to meta file if available.

part_size.description: Size of single file part. If set to 0 then file is distributed within a single part (default). Part URLs can be evaluated from first part URL - second and following parts have '.INDEX' names. For instance ../c49fde98-a07c-11e7-8919-33f7211dd1c0 is first part, then ../c49fde98-a07c-11e7-8919-33f7211dd1c0.1 is second and ../c49fde98-a07c-11e7-8919-33f7211dd1c0.2 is third.
